about-story-p: Since our establishment, Kuo Wei Fa-Li Mechanical Co., Ltd. has been dedicated to providing the highest quality lifting equipment. We combine innovative technology with years of industry experience to provide tailor-made solutions for our customers.
about-mission-p: Our mission is to help customers improve work efficiency and safety through excellent products and services. We believe that continuous improvement and commitment to quality are the keys to success.
news-item1-desc: We are pleased to announce the launch of our latest GW-X series cranes, featuring greater efficiency and safety.
news-item2-desc: We will be participating in the upcoming annual industrial exhibition. Welcome to visit our booth #123.
news-item3-desc: Our website will undergo routine maintenance next Tuesday, during which there may be brief interruptions.
